en-US.gridSliceExpl: You can slice the current document content using a grid whose blocks reflect the dimensions specified below. The document content will be flattened, the canvas resized to the grid dimensions and each grid block will appear on a new layer.
en-US.layerVisibilityExpl: Enable if all sliced layers should by default be visible (not recommended for transparent content). When disabled, only the last new layer will be visible.
